name: Stumpy - The Root Of All Evil
name_original: Stumpy - The Root Of All Evil
description:
Stumpy is a tree stump. 

He's been through it all and has nothing to lose. 

But behind those hollow eyes...

deep down below the bark...

is a whole lotta wood...

and these stoners are about to realise: 

This stump's bark is stronger than its bite! 

Play as Stumpy to defend the local vegetables against an onslaught of 'Stone'-ers, drunk on Root-beer and too much Rock'n'Roll! 

*Tip: Try timing a downward attack to move about easier! 

PS. Where are the rocks going, and what is this ritual Carrot head speaks of?
